name: MetricCardThree
description: Metric card with icon badge, title header, and large value display.

icon.note: Lucide icon displayed in primary-button styled circular badge

title.note: Metric category/label displayed next to icon

value.note: Large metric value displayed below icon and title

propsSchema.metrics: Array<{ id: string, icon: LucideIcon, title: string, value: string }>
propsSchema.animationType: 'none' | 'opacity' | 'slide-up' | 'scale-rotate' | 'blur-reveal' (required - controls GSAP scroll animations with stagger effect)
propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.titleSegments?: Array<{ type: 'text', content: string } | { type: 'image', src: string, alt?: string }> - For inline images in title
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>
propsSchema.textboxLayout: 'default' | 'split' | 'split-actions' | 'split-description' | 'inline-image' (required - 'inline-image' uses titleSegments for rich text with images)

usageExample: <MetricCardThree metrics={[{ id: '1', icon: TrendingUp, title: 'Conversions', value: '7,000+' }, { id: '2', icon: Users, title: 'Active Users', value: '50,000+' }]} title="Performance Metrics" description="See how we're making a difference" textboxLayout="default" animationType="slide-up" useInvertedBackground={"noInvert"} />
